CONTROLS:
SPACE to jump
Press CTRL to slide.
Hold R to rewind time.
Press ESC to pause.

The game gets faster over time and hitting obstacles will slow you to your disadvantage. Green Orbs contain powerups including 1/2 speed, reduced distance, rewind time refill and obstacle immunity. Coins can be collected on the way to boost your score. Platforms also get further apart as the game progresses.
